title: [Keycard] Something went wrong error shown when multitapping card in Unpair card flow
body:
# Problem
Something went wrong error shown when multitapping card in Unpair card flow

![image](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/28752642/57571812-545f9500-741b-11e9-903c-76fd42d9abac.png)

## Steps


1. create account with keycard
1. login
1. profile -> keycard -> unpair card
1. confirm the dialog -> enter PIN
1. tap the card quickly several times

## Logs


